customHtmlSections.title: About Take Care of Shadow Milk
customHtmlSections.content:
Take Care of Shadow Milk

Take Care of Shadow Milk is a free virtual pet simulator game inspired by the beloved Shadow Milk Cookie from Cookie Run: Kingdom. In this playful online experience, you can feed, care for, or prank your digital companion in different room environments.

Originally created on Scratch by GPE_sb3, this game became a viral sensation on TikTok thanks to its unique blend of cuteness and mischief. It captures the quirky charm of Shadow Milk Cookie while offering endless interactions with no strict rules.

Whether you are a long-time Cookie Run fan or just looking for a fun virtual pet, Take Care of Shadow Milk delivers unpredictable, chaotic, and adorable funâ€”all right in your browser with no downloads required.
